languages.text:
Блюстители-Блаженные перенесли древние знания, хранившиеся в их умах, в реальность, перестроив корабельные орудия с использованием священных технологий археотеха.
Дальнобойные {g|Encyclopedia:DorsalSpace}башенные{/g} плазменные {g|Encyclopedia:MacroCannonsSpace}макропушки{/g} с 2 зарядами, наносящими по 26 {g|Encyclopedia:SpaceBattleDamageGlossary}урона{/g}.

The Touched who were recruited as enforcers gave form to the ancient knowledge stored in their minds by modifying the voidship's weapons using sacred archeotech.
Long-range {g|Encyclopedia:DorsalSpace}dorsal{/g} plasma {g|Encyclopedia:MacroCannonsSpace}macro-cannons{/g}, which fire 2 shots, dealing 26 {g|Encyclopedia:SpaceBattleDamageGlossary}damage{/g} per shot.
languages.original_text:
Блюстители-Блаженные перенесли древние знания, хранившиеся в их умах, в реальность, перестроив корабельные орудия с использованием священных технологий археотеха.
Дальнобойные {g|Encyclopedia:DorsalSpace}башенные{/g} плазменные {g|Encyclopedia:MacroCannonsSpace}макропушки{/g} с 2 зарядами, наносящими по 26 {g|Encyclopedia:SpaceBattleDamageGlossary}урона{/g}.

traits.locale_text: The Touched recruited as enforcers gave form to the ancient knowledge stored in their minds by creating a modification of a widely used weapon.
The Touched recruited as enforcers gave form to the ancient knowledge stored in their minds by creating a modification of a widely used weapon.

The Touched who were recruited as enforcers gave form to the ancient knowledge stored in their minds by modifying the voidship's weapons using sacred archeotech.
Long-range {g|Encyclopedia:DorsalSpace}dorsal{/g} plasma {g|Encyclopedia:MacroCannonsSpace}macro-cannons{/g}, which fire 2 shots, dealing 26 {g|Encyclopedia:SpaceBattleDamageGlossary}damage{/g} per shot.

The Touched who were recruited as enforcers gave form to the ancient knowledge stored in their minds by modifying the voidship's weapons using sacred archeotech.
Long-range {g|Encyclopedia:DorsalSpace}dorsal{/g} plasma {g|Encyclopedia:MacroCannonsSpace}macro-cannons{/g}, which fire 2 shots, dealing 26 {g|Encyclopedia:SpaceBattleDamageGlossary}damage{/g} per shot.

The Touched who were recruited as enforcers gave form to the ancient knowledge stored in their minds by modifying the voidship's weapons using sacred archeotech.
Long-range {g|Encyclopedia:DorsalSpace}dorsal{/g} plasma {g|Encyclopedia:MacroCannonsSpace}macro-cannons{/g}, which fire 2 shots, dealing 26 {g|Encyclopedia:SpaceBattleDamageGlossary}damage{/g} per shot.

languages.text:
Les Illuminés qui ont été recrutés comme prévôts ont donné forme aux anciennes connaissances stockées dans leur esprit en modifiant les armes du vaisseau spatial à l'aide d'une archéotechnologie sacrée.
{g|Encyclopedia:MacroCannonsSpace}Macro-canons{/g} plasma {g|Encyclopedia:DorsalSpace}dorsaux{/g} à longue portée, qui tire 2 fois et inflige 26 {g|Encyclopedia:SpaceBattleDamageGlossary}dégâts{/g} par tir.
languages.original_text:
The Touched who were recruited as enforcers gave form to the ancient knowledge stored in their minds by modifying the voidship's weapons using sacred archeotech.
Long-range {g|Encyclopedia:DorsalSpace}dorsal{/g} plasma {g|Encyclopedia:MacroCannonsSpace}macro-cannons{/g}, which fire 2 shots, dealing 26 {g|Encyclopedia:SpaceBattleDamageGlossary}damage{/g} per shot.

traits.locale_text:
Les Illuminés qui ont été recrutés comme prévôts ont donné forme aux anciennes connaissances stockées dans leur esprit en modifiant les armes du vaisseau spatial à l'aide d'une archéotechnologie sacrée.
{g|Encyclopedia:MacroCannonsSpace}Macro-canons{/g} plasma {g|Encyclopedia:DorsalSpace}dorsaux{/g} à longue portée, qui tire 2 fois et inflige 26 {g|Encyclopedia:SpaceBattleDamageGlossary}dégâts{/g} par tir.

Les Illuminés qui ont été recrutés comme prévôts ont donné forme aux anciennes connaissances stockées dans leur esprit en modifiant les armes du vaisseau spatial à l’aide d’une archéotechnologie sacrée.
{g|Encyclopedia:MacroCannonsSpace}Macro-canons{/g} plasma {g|Encyclopedia:DorsalSpace}dorsaux{/g} à longue portée, qui tire 2 fois et inflige 26 {g|Encyclopedia:SpaceBattleDamageGlossary}dégâts{/g} par tir.

languages.text:
エンフォーサーとして採用された触れられし者たちは、神聖なる技術遺産を使ってヴォイドシップの武器を改造することで、彼らの頭脳に蓄えられていた古代の知識を形にした。
中距離の{g|Encyclopedia:DorsalSpace}背部{/g}{g|Encyclopedia:MacroCannonsSpace}マクロキャノン{/g}。2発発射し、それぞれが26{g|Encyclopedia:SpaceBattleDamageGlossary}ダメージ{/g}を与える。
languages.original_text:
The Touched who were recruited as enforcers gave form to the ancient knowledge stored in their minds by modifying the voidship's weapons using sacred archeotech.
Long-range {g|Encyclopedia:DorsalSpace}dorsal{/g} plasma {g|Encyclopedia:MacroCannonsSpace}macro-cannons{/g}, which fire 2 shots, dealing 26 {g|Encyclopedia:SpaceBattleDamageGlossary}damage{/g} per shot.

traits.locale_text: エンフォーサーとして採用された触れられし者たちは、広く使われている武器の改造品を作ることで、彼らの頭脳に蓄えられていた古代の知識を形にした。

languages.text:
成为执法者后，受召者利用神圣的远古科技改造了虚空舰的武器，让脑海中的远古知识发挥了作用。
这种远程等离子{g|Encyclopedia:MacroCannonsSpace}宏炮{/g}组安装在{g|Encyclopedia:DorsalSpace}船脊{/g}，可发射2枚炮弹，每枚炮弹可造成26点{g|Encyclopedia:SpaceBattleDamageGlossary}伤害{/g}。
languages.original_text:
The Touched who were recruited as enforcers gave form to the ancient knowledge stored in their minds by modifying the voidship's weapons using sacred archeotech.
Long-range {g|Encyclopedia:DorsalSpace}dorsal{/g} plasma {g|Encyclopedia:MacroCannonsSpace}macro-cannons{/g}, which fire 2 shots, dealing 26 {g|Encyclopedia:SpaceBattleDamageGlossary}damage{/g} per shot.

traits.locale_text:
成为执法者后，受召者利用神圣的远古科技改造了虚空舰的武器，让脑海中的远古知识发挥了作用。
这种远程等离子{g|Encyclopedia:MacroCannonsSpace}宏炮{/g}组安装在{g|Encyclopedia:DorsalSpace}船脊{/g}，可发射2枚炮弹，每枚炮弹可造成26点{g|Encyclopedia:SpaceBattleDamageGlossary}伤害{/g}。

languages.text:
Los Tocados que fueron reclutados como personal de seguridad dieron forma a los antiguos conocimientos almacenados en sus mentes y modificaron las armas de la nave del vacío usando arqueotecnología sagrada.
{g|Encyclopedia:MacroCannonsSpace}Macrocañones{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:DorsalSpace}dorsales{/g} de largo alcance de plasma que disparan 2 veces, infligiendo 26 de {g|Encyclopedia:SpaceBattleDamageGlossary}daño{/g} por disparo.
languages.original_text:
The Touched who were recruited as enforcers gave form to the ancient knowledge stored in their minds by modifying the voidship's weapons using sacred archeotech.
Long-range {g|Encyclopedia:DorsalSpace}dorsal{/g} plasma {g|Encyclopedia:MacroCannonsSpace}macro-cannons{/g}, which fire 2 shots, dealing 26 {g|Encyclopedia:SpaceBattleDamageGlossary}damage{/g} per shot.

traits.locale_text:
Los Tocados que fueron reclutados como personal de seguridad dieron forma a los antiguos conocimientos almacenados en sus mentes y modificaron las armas de la nave del vacío usando arqueotecnología sagrada.
{g|Encyclopedia:MacroCannonsSpace}Macrocañones{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:DorsalSpace}dorsales{/g} de largo alcance de plasma que disparan 2 veces, infligiendo 26 de {g|Encyclopedia:SpaceBattleDamageGlossary}daño{/g} por disparo.

languages.text:
Die Berührten, die als Enforcers rekrutiert wurden, haben dem alten Wissen in ihrem Kopf Gestalt verliehen – durch die Modifikation der Raumschiffwaffen durch heilige Archäotech.
Mittelstrecken-{g|Encyclopedia:DorsalSpace}Dorsal{/g}-{g|Encyclopedia:MacroCannonsSpace}Makrokanonen{/g}, die 2 Schüsse abfeuern und 26 {g|Encyclopedia:SpaceBattleDamageGlossary}Schaden{/g} pro Schuss verursachen.
languages.original_text:
The Touched who were recruited as enforcers gave form to the ancient knowledge stored in their minds by modifying the voidship's weapons using sacred archeotech.
Long-range {g|Encyclopedia:DorsalSpace}dorsal{/g} plasma {g|Encyclopedia:MacroCannonsSpace}macro-cannons{/g}, which fire 2 shots, dealing 26 {g|Encyclopedia:SpaceBattleDamageGlossary}damage{/g} per shot.

traits.locale_text: Die Berührten, die als Enforcers rekrutiert wurden, haben dem alten Wissen in ihrem Kopf Gestalt verliehen — durch den Bau einer Modifikation für eine weit verbreitete Waffe.

languages.text:
İnfazcı olarak görevlendirilen Mütehassisler, kutsal arkeotek kullanıp uçsuz gemisinin silahlarını modifiye ederek kadim irfana şekil verdiler.
Her biri 26 {g|Encyclopedia:SpaceBattleDamageGlossary}hasar{/g} veren 2 atış yapan uzun menzilli, {g|Encyclopedia:DorsalSpace}sırt{/g} kısmına monte plazma {g|Encyclopedia:MacroCannonsSpace}makro topları{/g}.
languages.original_text:

Long-range {g|Encyclopedia:DorsalSpace}dorsal{/g} plasma {g|Encyclopedia:MacroCannonsSpace}macro-cannons{/g}, which fire 2 shots, dealing 26 {g|Encyclopedia:SpaceBattleDamageGlossary}damage{/g} per shot.
